description: This file defines a 'RecipeCard' component using LightningJS framework. It displays key information about a recipe, such as title, time, difficulty, rating, cuisine, servings, and favorite status. It also handles user interactions like navigating to recipe detail, toggling favorite status, and managing focus.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A focusable LightningJS component that displays recipe information and handles user interaction.

methods.name: setFocused
methods.description: Sets the focused state of the component to show or hide the focus ring.

methods.name: goToDetail
methods.description: Navigates to the recipe detail view based on the recipe ID.

methods.name: favToggle
methods.description: Toggles the favorite status of the current recipe via external action.
